reviewText: What a waste of time!  I brought this movie because it stars John Phillip Law.  I recently viewed  "The Russians are Coming, The Russians are Coming", and I was impressed with JPL's performance.  But, his acting (acting??) in "Cold Heat" is horrific, bland and amateurish!  The opening sequence looks as though it was shot out of a car window.  This entire movie  --  from the story line to the acting is pathetic.
